about_the_game:
Synopsis

They're a match made in heaven: perpetually unlucky hospitality worker Akuru Hayahoshi and uncannily lucky fashionista Ren Furutachi.
After a rocky start (accidental engagement, anyone?), the two are now officially a couple.

One day, there's a raffle for the mobile game Akuru's super into.
Naturally, she sinks a ton of money into it to try and bring her husbando home; and, surprising no one, she ends up with every character except for the one she truly wants.
When Ren spots a notebook among the pile of merch Akuru brings back, she comes up with an idea:

"Let's do an exchange diary! We each write an entry every day then swap them over!"

Although Akuru is reluctant at first, Ren talks her into going along with it.
From attempts at hand-holding to a special manicure from Ren...
Even when it comes to something as simple as daily life, silly shenanigans and misunderstandings abound between our sweet sapphic couple.

Check in with Akuru and Ren after the events of the main game in this voice drama for the slapstick yuri romantic comedy "OshiRabu: Waifus Over Husbandos"!

Track List

Track1.Day0
Raffle Ruination

Track2.Day1
Day 1 - Shopping Date

Track3.Day2
Day 2 - Painting Nails

Track4.Day3
Day 3 - Raffle Redo

Track5.Day4
Day 4 - Go To Sleep

Track6.Epilogue
The Next Day

Each track is included in MP3 and FLAC format.
Also includes mp4 with subtitles.
(English,Simplified Chinese,Traditional Chinese )
